page.title: 19HASELEY KNOB:DOG KENNELS (1)
page.content: {Who owns the Kennels?}The National Canine Defence League. {How long have they been here?}19years. {How do local people feel about them? One lady complains,but some local people come and help. { {How many people work here?}11. {Are they local?}Some of them. {What work do you have to do?}We have to clean the kennels,exercise the dogs,treat any sick dogs and see to customers. {How many dogs can you look after? 230,and we are full at the moment. { {Where do the dogs come from?}Some come from police stations,homes by the road and some are tied to our gate. {How many puppies do you have at the {moment?}27 under 8 weeks,and 8 between 8 and 12 weeks.
